name: Wellness Mirror
tagline: Wellness Mirror is a mirror that reads a person’s quantified self data such as physical activities, sleep hours, weight and etc from FitBit
body: Wellness Mirror =============== Wellness Mirror is a mirror that reads a person’s quantified self data (physical activities, sleep hours, weight…) and translates the data into different colors and patterns of light that illuminates users in front of the mirror. In this way, users can see a person’s vigor and vitality through the reflection of themselves altered by the data. ##PROTOTYPE ##AUTHORS ####Maria Paula Saba ####Maxwell Dayvson da Silva
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
